en-US.summary: Get the latest and greatest from Overheard LA
examplePhrases: Alexa ask local smut for some smut
Alexa tell local smut to tell me some smut
en-US.name: Local Smut
en-US.description:
Ask for Local Smut, and learn about what really matters, like an Angeleno's take on committment.

Local Smut provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you think less of Los Angeles.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Local Smut" or "Alexa, open Local Smut" to get a quote".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
